thread.title: Ho Chi Minh City launches movement to build friendly tourism environmentTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Ho Chi Minh City launches movement to build friendly tourism environmentTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ho Chi Minh City launches movement to build friendly tourism environmentTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ho Chi Minh City launches movement to build friendly tourism environment Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
A ceremony was launched in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in response to an action movement to build a friendly tourism environment.
The movement aims to build and maintain an attractive and friendly environment for tourism activities and ensure social security and order at the city’s tourism sites, Director of the municipal Department of Tourism Van Thi Bach Tuyet said.
A crowd of youth from travel agencies joined the tourist support forces and distributed leaflets to businesses and households along key tourism streets.
Ho Chi Minh City recorded an average annual tourism growth of 26 per cent, accounting for 11 percent of the city’s GDP. It attracted over two million foreign tourists in the first half of this year, up 3 per cent over the same period last year.
According to the Department, the activities will be carried out daily until the beginning of 2016 towards bringing a safe and friendly tourism environment to visitors, thus attracting more arrivals to the city.
